target_assessment.notes: [Wrong vulnerability type. The model does not correctly identify the issue in ground_truth but goes ahead to state a DESIGN_CHOICE as the target issue ]

other_findings.model_claim: [The transfer uses reimbursementAmount[i] instead of reimbursementAmount[reimbursementRecipients[i]], which looks up the amount using the index i cast to an address. This results in transferring incorrect amounts to the recipients, potentially misallocating funds.]
other_findings.reasoning: [The issue is valid but out of scope in this context ]
